source_caption_data.pre_caption: In this third-person perspective video, the camera maintains a medium shot on a man, positioning him in the lower-left of the frame as he moves forward. The scene begins with the man in the foreground, standing before a set of train tracks that recede from the bottom of the frame into the center background, creating a sense of depth. A graffiti-covered structure and a wooden barricade occupy the center-right middle ground, with red lights positioned on the left. As the character walks forward along the tracks, the camera, positioned at his level, follows smoothly. This movement causes the middle-ground structures to shift toward the edges of the frame and eventually off-screen as he passes them. The character's flashlight beam moves dynamically, illuminating different sections of the rocky tunnel walls in the middle ground and background. Throughout the sequence, HUD elements are fixed in the bottom-right and bottom-left corners, while subtitles appear in the bottom center, all overlaid in the extreme foreground.
